mece_validation.level_1: Desirability (value) vs Feasibility (capability) vs Viability (sustainability) are mutually exclusive and collectively exhaustive for strategic decisions
mece_validation.level_2: Each L1 branch decomposed into 3 non-overlapping dimensions that fully cover the parent question
mece_validation.level_3: Specific, measurable questions that can be answered with data

usage_instructions.step_1: Score each L3 leaf on a 0-10 scale based on available data
usage_instructions.step_2: Weight L3 leaves within each L2 branch (default: equal weight)
usage_instructions.step_3: Roll up L3 scores to L2 averages
usage_instructions.step_4: Weight L2 branches within each L1 (default: equal weight)
usage_instructions.step_5: Roll up to L1 scores (Desirability, Feasibility, Viability)
usage_instructions.step_6: Apply decision threshold (e.g., all three >7 = SCALE, any <5 = NO-GO)

decision_logic.conditional_scale: All L1 dimensions score ≥5.0 with clear mitigation plans for gaps
decision_logic.no_go: Any L1 dimension scores <5.0 with no viable mitigation path
decision_logic.needs_more_data: Insufficient data to score >50% of L3 leaves
